name: Gremlin Invasion: Survivor
description: Gremlin Invasion: Survivor is a co-op overhead action shooter. With 8 different levels to choose from and up to 8 players, you'll play together in a survival-style mission to blast away hordes of gremlins that have come to take you out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel 2.26 GHz Core 2 Duo or equivalent AMD processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia OpenGL 3.3 compatible / AMD HD7700 series (OpenGL 3.3 required) or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Local CO-OP is supported out of the box. For online CO-OP, you need to enable port forwarding for port 28327, UDP service type, on your router. A fast internet connection is highly recommended.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 Processor: Intel i5 Quad Core 3.4 GHz or equivalent AMD processor Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 560 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Local CO-OP is supported out of the box. For online CO-OP, you need to enable port forwarding for port 28327, UDP service type, on your router. A fast internet connection is highly recommended.
